title: Fallen Angel’s Descent
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Kukuku......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh? What’s up, Kanata-chan? You seem different today......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I’m not Kanata, call me Fallen Angel Caim, Yohane-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh...... Who are you......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Caim is an infamous fallen angel known for raising over 30 legions of demons...... I thought it would be fun to appear in a livestream with you, Yohane-chan...... We could have an awesome fallen angel meeting together...... Kukuku......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>...So you’ve been influenced by my streams.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah~! I want to appear in one too~! Wait, no! ......Caim-chan wants to stand at the top of the world of fallen angels with Yohane-chan~ Kukuku~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>How naive!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I commend you for finding the name of the fallen angel Caim. I can tell you did some research. But that’s not strong enough of a character to work with! Too naive! It’s not okay to be so naive!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Aww...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>But you can still appear on my livestreams. But first, we need to do some special training!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hmm, this is more intense than I thought it would be~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Fallen angels don’t complain!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
